name: Introductory Chemistry
description: Introduction to basic concepts of Chemistry, such as the periodic table, reactions, and atomic structure.

name: Organic Chemistry
description: Introduction to the structure, properties, and reactions of organic compounds and polymers.

name: Analytical Chemistry
description: Introduction to the principles and techniques used to identify, separate, quantify, and analyze substances.

name: Physical Chemistry
description: Introduction to the study of the physical and chemical properties of matter, such as thermodynamics, kinetics, and quantum mechanics.

name: Environmental Chemistry
description: Introduction to the chemistry of the environment, including sources of environmental contamination, atmospheric chemistry, and water and soil chemistry.
